      • configureProxies

        public java.util.List<ProxyDetails<?>> configureProxies(@NotNull
                                                        java.util.List<java.io.File> globalTempFiles,
                                                        @NotNull
                                                        java.util.List<java.io.File> tempFiles)
        Description copied from interface: ProxyManager
        Create and configure all the proxies that are required ti run the test. This can include security proxies like ZAP, request modifying proxies like BrowserMob, and configuration of external proxies.
        Specified by:
        configureProxies in interface ProxyManager
        Parameters:
        globalTempFiles - Tempoarry files to be cleaned up once Iridium is closed
        tempFiles - Temporary files to be cleaned up after test is completed
        Returns:
        A list of proxies created

      • stopProxies

        public void stopProxies(@NotNull
                        java.util.List<ProxyDetails<?>> proxies,
                        java.lang.String reportOutput)
        Description copied from interface: ProxyManager
        Gracefully shutdown proxies before we exit the app
        Specified by:
        stopProxies in interface ProxyManager
        Parameters:
        proxies - The list of proxies that were created for this test
        reportOutput - The directory holding report output
